set and get phenofit option

Source: R/global_options.R
set_options.Rd

set and get phenofit option

set_options(..., options = NULL)

get_options(names = NULL)

Arguments

...

list of phenofit options FUN_season: character, season_mov or season rFUN: character, rough fitting function. smooth_wWHIT, smooth_wSG or smooth_wHANTs.

options

If not NULL, options will be used and ... patched.

names

vector of character, names of options

Examples

set_options(verbose = FALSE)
get_options("season") %>% str()
#> List of 25
#>  $ rFUN             : chr "smooth_wWHIT"
#>  $ iters            : num 2
#>  $ wmin             : num 0.1
#>  $ wFUN             :function (y, yfit, w, iter = 2, nptperyear, wfact = 0.5, ...)  
#>   ..- attr(*, "name")= chr "wTSM"
#>  $ verbose          : logi TRUE
#>  $ lambda           : num 10
#>  $ .lambda_vcurve   : logi TRUE
#>  $ frame            : num 9
#>  $ nf               : num 4
#>  $ minpeakdistance  : NULL
#>  $ ypeak_min        : num 0.05
#>  $ r_max            : num 0.2
#>  $ r_min            : num 0.05
#>  $ rtrough_max      : num 0.6
#>  $ MaxPeaksPerYear  : num 2
#>  $ MaxTroughsPerYear: num 3
#>  $ calendarYear     : logi FALSE
#>  $ adj.param        : logi TRUE
#>  $ rm.closed        : logi TRUE
#>  $ is.continuous    : logi TRUE
#>  $ .check_season    : logi TRUE
#>  $ maxExtendMonth   : num 12
#>  $ nextend          : NULL
#>  $ len_min          : num 45
#>  $ len_max          : num 650
